channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Migration Toolkit for Runtimes 1 on RHEL 8

item.title: CVE-2024-1132|2024-10-22T01:19:27.880Z -- red%20hat -- migration%20toolkit%20for%20runtimes%201%20on%20rhel%208
item.description: A flaw was found in Keycloak, where it does not properly validate URLs included in a redirect. This issue could allow an attacker to construct a malicious request to bypass validation and access other URLs and sensitive information within the domain or conduct further attacks. This flaw affects any client that utilizes a wildcard in the Valid Redirect URIs field, and requires user interaction within the malicious URL.
